step-1.title: Step 1
step-1.info-text: Please note that only one application per email address will be accepted.

step-2.title: Step 2
step-2.information-note: Please note that the questions in this section will not affect your eligibility for the program, and will be used only for program analysis and evaluation. Please provide the answers that you feel are most applicable to you. You may choose to select "Prefer not to answer" for any question in this section.

step-3.title: Step 3
step-3.information-note: The questions in this section will be used to guide the development of learning activities and workshops, ensuring that programming reflects the needs and interests of participants. You will not be evaluated on the quality of your writing, but the minimum number of words must be respected. Profanity and/or disrespectful language will not be tolerated.

step-4.title: Review content and submit the application
step-4.header: Please review your answers carefully. Only one application per email address will be accepted and applications cannot be modified after they have been submitted.
step-4.privacy-notice-statement: Check out our Privacy Notice Statement
